product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: P | BIOBIQUETE STORE > P1 | AUTOMATIC SPRINKLER SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope. 80 mm NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(mild steel), grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: indian standard 1239 part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, coating: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joint type: grooved with groove coupling, scope: all related civil work, supports etc of vendor's scope

original_rows.1: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope.
Supply,Installation of Butterfly valve as per BS :5155 (Wafer type) matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.. Necessary fittings shall be provided by erection vendor.
Providing & fixing Non return valve (Wafer type) with matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.
Supply & fixing of paddle type Flow Switch
Supply,Fixing of Sprinkler Head Pendent type for K factor-80. Temp rating 68 deg C.UL/FM Approved.
Supply, installation of automatic 25 NB Air Release Valve
Supply & installation of Bronze Globe Valves conforming to IS: 778 with screwed ends
Supply,Erection and testing of Installation Control Valve complete with trims & gong.
Supply, installation, testing & commissioning of CS Gate Valve as per API 600, class 150 with matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.
